data.trans_hint: Cô ấy chưa bao giờ thực sự sống hòa thuận với chị gái.
data.en_hint: She's never really got on with her sister.
data.content_game_1: She's never really got on with her sister.
data.answer_en_hint: She's never really got on with her sister.

data.trans_hint: Tôi ngạc nhiên vì anh ta đã mắc lừa trò đùa đó đấy.
data.en_hint: I'm surprised he fell for that trick.
data.content_game_1: I'm surprised he fell for that trick.
data.answer_en_hint: I'm surprised he fell for that trick.

data.trans: Chấm dứt mối quan hệ với ai
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã chấm dứt mối quan hệ với bạn gái của mình vào tuần trước.
data.en_hint: He finished with his girlfriend last week.
data.content_game_1: He finished with his girlfriend last week.
data.answer_en_hint: He finished with his girlfriend last week.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy sẽ dọn đến sống cùng bạn trai mình vào tuần tới.
data.en_hint: She will move in with her boyfriend next week.
data.content_game_1: She will move in with her boyfriend next week.
data.answer_en_hint: She will move in with her boyfriend next week.

data.trans_hint: William vừa mới bỏ bạn gái vì anh ta phát hiện cô ả lừa gạt mình để hẹn hò với chính cậu bạn thân của anh ta.
data.en_hint: William has just dumped his girlfriend as he found out she cheated on him to date his close friend.
data.content_game_1: William has just dumped his girlfriend as he found out she cheated on him to date his close friend.
data.answer_en_hint: William has just dumped his girlfriend as he found out she cheated on him to date his close friend.

data.trans: Hồi hộp, căng thẳng (trước một việc quan trọng nào đó)
data.trans_hint: Cô ta đã rất căng thẳng trước khi đám cưới diễn ra.
data.en_hint: She had cold feet before the wedding.
data.content_game_1: She had cold feet before the wedding.
data.answer_en_hint: She had cold feet before the wedding.

data.trans: Tâm đầu ý hợp (dù mới quen)
data.trans_hint: Emma và tôi tâm đầu ý hợp ngay từ khi mới quen sau khi cả 2 chúng tôi vừa chia tay bồ cũ.
data.en_hint: Emma and I hit it off immediately after we just broke up with our exes.
data.content_game_1: Emma and I hit it off immediately after we just broke up with our exes.
data.answer_en_hint: Emma and I hit it off immediately after we just broke up with our exes.

data.trans_hint: Tôi cảm thấy rất tồi tệ vì đã làm tổn thương người yêu cũ của mình.
data.en_hint: I felt terrible about hurting my ex-girlfriend in a big way.
data.content_game_1: I felt terrible about hurting my ex-girlfriend in a big way.
data.answer_en_hint: I felt terrible about hurting my ex-girlfriend in a big way.

data.content: not have the heart to do
data.trans_hint: Cuối cùng thì cậu ta cũng không nỡ bỏ bạn gái cũ để theo đuổi một người mới, nên cậu ta đã quay lại với cô ta sau 1 tháng chia cách.
data.en_hint: Finally, he didn't have the heart to leave his ex-girlfriend to move on with a new one, so he came back to her after 1 month of separation.
data.content_game_1: Finally, he didn't have the heart to leave his ex-girlfriend to move on with a new one, so he came back to her after 1 month of separation.
data.answer_en_hint: Finally, he didn't have the heart to leave his ex-girlfriend to move on with a new one, so he came back to her after 1 month of separation.

data.trans: Gợi cho ai đó nhớ về ai
data.trans_hint: Hương nước hoa của cô bạn gái hiện tại thi thoảng vẫn gợi cho anh ta nhớ về người yêu cũ.
data.en_hint: The scent of his current girlfriend perfume sometimes still reminds him of his ex.
data.content_game_1: The scent of his current girlfriend perfume sometimes still reminds him of his ex.
data.answer_en_hint: The scent of his current girlfriend perfume sometimes still reminds him of his ex.
